names:
Pius Uzamere







Building Ether, a new way to tell stories with virtual reality.
Ran engineering at The Information. Co-founded BeCouply. Open source contributor. Erstwhile privacy wonk who helped write a few standards at NIST. Student body president and head of Student Cable at MIT back in the day.

descriptions: Building Ether, a new way to tell stories with virtual reality.

Ran engineering at The Information. Co-founded BeCouply. Open source contributor. Erstwhile privacy wonk who helped write a few standards at NIST. Student body president and head of Student Cable at MIT back in the day.
Pius Uzamere is an engineer, open source contributor, and startup founder specializing in consumer internet with in-depth experience in designing and shipping mobile and web apps.
